title: How can I change the Y536A1 phone system font size?
answer:
Go to the **Settings** screen, and touch **Display** > **Font size**. Choose a font size from the displayed option menu.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141023050631760001.png)

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141023050632292002.png)

                                       The figures are for your
reference only. The actual screens may vary.
